UiWidth¶

number UiWidth()

Description¶

Gets the width of the game’s window (in pixels).

Returns¶

number

The width of the game’s window in pixels

Example¶

Prints the width of the screen

print( UiWidth() )

Output: 1280 (depends on your resolution)
